title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 ยง 8151.21 - Town of Saugerties
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 ยง 8151.21 - Town of Saugerties

State Regulations
(a) Route
32. Route 32 between Old Kings Highway (CR 31) and Route 32A, a distance of
6.5+- miles. (b) Old Kings Highway. Old Kings Highway (CR 31) between Route 31/212 and Sterling Road, a distance of
3.1+- miles in the Town of Saugerties. (c) Sterling Road. Sterling Road between Old

Kings Highway (CR 31) and the Consolidated Freightways terminal, a distance of
0.1 mile in the Town of Saugerties. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17
ยง
8151.21

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
